content:
Call to Action above the button:
"Ready to get fit from the comfort of your own home? Join Fitclass now and access a variety of fitness classes, follow your favorite trainers, and manage your class schedules and reservations with ease!"

CTA button text:
"Join Fitclass Now"

OR

"Sign Up for Fitclass"

OR

"Start your Fitclass journey"

You can choose one that fit's best for your website and make it stand out. Also note that you can A/B test your CTA button text to see which one converts better.
